name: Miss Clue: Peril In Pemberley!
summary: As Jane Darcy, the daughter of Mr. Darcy and Elizabeth Bennet, you must explore the richly decorated halls and elegant grounds of the great Pemberley estate and unravel the strange happenings that threaten Pemberley!
